field.email_format: This field has to be a valid email

label.motivation: Why do you want to sit?
label.sitters: Look for a perfect sitter for your pet

sitter.motivation: Why do you want to sit?

sitters.title: Find your pets' favourite sitter in just a view clicks
sitters.description: A community of pet sitters keeping pets happy while you cannot take care of them.

community.title: Our pet loving community
community.description: All pet sitters & owners gathered in one place to make pets happy and their owners satisfied

main_page.title: Pet sitting with love and experience
main_page.description: Book a free verified and reviewed pet sitter from our pet-loving community, or find a pet to sit

register.title: Register form
register.description: Please fill in required fields to create your account

email_verification.title: Email verification
email_verification.description: Congratulations! Your email has been verified. You will be redirected to login page in {{val}} seconds.

become_petsitter.title: Become a pet sitter
become_petsitter.description: You are just a few steps away from becoming a pet sitter. Please fill in all required fields to join PetPal community

experience.title: Pet sitting experience
experience.description: Describe your experience with animals, why do you want to be a pet sitter, and what animals would you like to sit

availability.title: Availability
availability.description: Please fill in your availability to help potential pet owners in making the right plans

summary.title: Pet sitter form summary
summary.description: Please check if everything is just like you want it to be

contact.title: Contact info
contact.description: Fill up your contact details to make it easier for a potencial sitter or pet owner to contact you. Only LOGGED user can view this data.

email_verification.success: Registration completed successfully! You can now login using provided credentials

access.not_logged_in: Access denied. Please log in to enter this page
access.logged_in: Access denied. You cannot enter this page while logged in

profile_pic.success: Profile picture has been updated successfully

login.success: You have been logged in successfully
